mapper.select: SELECT member_no as memberNo, member_id as memberId, member_pw as memberPw, member_name as memberName, member_picture as memberPicture, member_depart_name as memberDepartName, member_main_task as memberMainTask, member_email_certify as memberEmailCertify from member where member_id = #{memberId} and member_pw = #{memberPw}

select auto_no as autoNo, member_no as memberNo, auto_time as autoTime, auto_key as autoKey from auto_login where auto_key = #{sessionId} and TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(auto_time,'YYMMDD')) > TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(sysdate,'YYMMDD'))

mapper.update: update member set member_email_certify='Y' where member_id=#{userEmail}
